title: The Art of Painting in the Twentieth Century (Art Ebook).pdf
description:
The Art of Painting in the Twentieth Century
Hawthorn Books | 1965 | English | 330 pages | PDF | 28.5 MB

This anthology is the largest and most complete selection of twentieth-century artists' own writings on painting ever to be published. It contains many important documents never before available in English. These writings concern both the techniques of painting and the deepest spiritual concerns of the artist in the modern world. This volume begins with Signac, includes the writings of such modern masters as Matisse, Picasso, Klee and Chagall, and ends with the manifesto of Action Painting. Famous critics, among them Paul Valery and Andre Malraux, are also represented
